terms.title: Property Information and Accuracy
terms.description: We strive to provide accurate details, descriptions, and images for all properties listed on our platform. However, property conditions, amenities, and specifications may vary from descriptions due to updates, renovations, or natural changes. Property availability is subject to change without notice, and we reserve the right to remove listings or update information at any time. All property information is provided by brokers and property owners.

terms.title: Pricing and Financial Terms
terms.description: All property prices are listed in INR and are subject to market fluctuations. Prices may not include additional costs such as registration fees, stamp duty, maintenance charges, or other legal expenses. We reserve the right to update pricing information at any time. Financial transactions between buyers and sellers are conducted independently, and we do not handle direct payments for property transactions.

terms.title: Broker Verification and Credentials
terms.description: All brokers on our platform are required to provide valid RERA registration, license details, and professional credentials. We verify broker information but cannot guarantee the accuracy of all details. Users are responsible for conducting their own due diligence before engaging with any broker. We reserve the right to suspend or remove brokers who violate our terms or provide false information.

terms.title: Platform Usage and Responsibilities
terms.description: Users must provide accurate information and use the platform in compliance with applicable laws and regulations. Prohibited activities include posting false information, spamming, harassment, or any illegal activities. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms. Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account information.

terms.title: Property Viewing and Transactions
terms.description: Property viewings and transactions are arranged directly between buyers and brokers. We facilitate connections but are not responsible for the outcome of negotiations, property conditions, or transaction completion. All legal documentation, due diligence, and financial transactions are the responsibility of the parties involved. We recommend consulting with legal and financial advisors before making property decisions.

terms.title: Liability and Disclaimers
terms.description: We act as an intermediary platform connecting buyers with brokers and do not guarantee the accuracy of property information, broker credentials, or transaction outcomes. We are not liable for any losses, damages, or disputes arising from property transactions, broker interactions, or platform usage. Users engage with brokers and properties at their own risk and discretion.

terms.title: Data Privacy and Communication
terms.description: We collect and process personal information in accordance with our Privacy Policy. Communication between users and brokers may be monitored for quality assurance and safety purposes. Users consent to receiving property recommendations, market updates, and platform notifications. Users can opt out of marketing communications at any time through their account settings.

terms.title: Modifications and Updates
terms.description: We reserve the right to modify these terms and conditions at any time. Changes will be posted on our platform with the updated effective date. Continued use of the platform after modifications constitutes acceptance of the new terms. Users are responsible for reviewing these terms periodically to stay informed of any changes.
